DbDetails.DbTable: xbs.sd_so_header s left join xbs.option_line o on s.order_source_type=o.option_line_id left join xbs.hr_employee_v h on s.hr_employee_id=h.hr_employee_id left join xbs.payment_term p on s.payment_term_id=p.payment_term_id left join xbs.ar_customer a on s.ar_customer_id=a.ar_customer_id left join xbs.ar_customer_site a0 on s.ar_customer_site_id=a0.ar_customer_site_id left join xbs.currency c on s.doc_currency=c.currency_id left join xbs.address a1 on s.ship_to_id=a1.address_id left join xbs.address a2 on s.bill_to_id=a2.address_id left join xbs.currency c0 on s.currency=c0.currency_id left join xbs.option_line o0 on s.approval_status=o0.option_line_id left join xbs.option_line o1 on s.so_status=o1.option_line_id left join xbs.gl_currency_conversion g on s.exchange_rate_type=g.gl_currency_conversion_id
DbDetails.Data: s.so_number,s.document_extn_ref,o.option_line_value order_source_type,s.ordered_date,s.request_date,h.name hr_employee_id,p.payment_term payment_term_id,a.customer_name ar_customer_id,a0.customer_site_name ar_customer_site_id,c.title doc_currency,a1.address ship_to_id,a2.address bill_to_id,c0.title currency,s.exchange_rate,s.agreement_start_date,s.aggrement_end_date,s.released_amount,o0.option_line_value approval_status,s.description,o1.option_line_value so_status,s.prepaid_status,s.created_by,s.creation_date,s.last_update_by,s.last_update_date,s.sd_so_header_id,s.bu_org_id,s.header_amount,s.tax_amount,g.currency_conversion_type exchange_rate_type
